original_title: Contra el NO-DO. Llorenç Soler o la pulsión por la honestidad
overview: Life and filmography of Llorenç Soler (1936 – 2022), a creative pioneer of independent documentary cinema under Franco's dictatorial regime in Spain during the 1960s and '70s, when the information monopoly belonged to state-controlled NO-DO newsreels and RTVE, tools of political propaganda.
title: Contra el NO-DO. Llorenç Soler o la pulsión por la honestidad
